Description:
First Class Family Living
Built to exacting standards this majestic residence embodies, character, elegance and charm often sought but rarely found. Comprising of four spacious bedrooms, master with opulent ensuite and dressing room while the remaining rooms offer comfort rarely seen. A stunning stone kitchen with quality appliance and full butler’s pantry is central to the design that adjoins. Open planned living areas from the formality of the sumptuous lounge to the relaxed living/family room that extends beyond to private alfresco room. A rumpus/theatre room offers additional living. Encompassed by mature garden setting and garaging for two vehicles under the roofline. This is exceptional living in a premier enclave minutes from schools, parkland and shopping facilities. Other features include; ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, double glazed windows and hardwood floors.

Description:
THE PERFECT START IN ARCADIA
Offering the best in modern, convenient and affordable living is this young single level home situated in the Arcadia estate.
* Featuring 4 spacious bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe
* 2 separate living areas with a cosy sitting room and open plan family and meals
* Quality well appointed kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances
* Nicely finished with vinyl flooring, tiled in wet rooms, carpet in bedrooms and attractive neutral tones throughout
* For easy living the house features ducted heating, split system air conditioner, roller blinds and internal access from the garage
* The double garage has a remote control door, low maintenance gardens and all set on approximately 350sqm
* Possible rental return of approx $380 - $400 per week.
PLEASE NOTE: PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
Rare Opportunity
This quality family home is one of the rare few to come onto the market in the highly sought after Timber Top estate Officer. Forget the hassle of building, just move straight in! Built in 2016 by SJD Homes this Stanford 256 is situated on a generous 448sqm block.
With a clever floor plan the kitchen is the heart of the home with highlights including, Caesar stone bench tops, double sink, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. Flowing onto the well thought-out living and dining areas plus a study nook with also the added bonus of a media room plus plantation shutters throughout.
Featuring a grand master bedroom with upgraded ensuite including Stone bench tops, his and her vanity, heated towel rails and large shower with shower nook plus a walk in robe. Bedrooms 2, 3 and 4 all containing double built in robes and fans in each room. Main bathroom featuring a medina bath, heated towel rail and large shower with shower nook plus a separate toilet.
Outdoors provides an alfresco with caf blinds and built in deck lights overlooking a professionally landscaped split level backyard. The front yard also boasting professional landscaping overlooked from the front deck lit with inbuilt deck lights. With and automatic watering system throughout gardens front and back.
With all the comforts of central heating, evaporative cooling and a split system. Plus the added extras of 20 x solar panels (5kW total) connected to a 10KW storage battery system, double insulated roof and LED lighting throughout makes for a very efficient home.
This property wont be on the market for long !!

Description:
ENJOY EASY LIVING IN OFFICER!
This exceptionally stylish home is ideally located in the most desirable and convenient vibrant Arcadia estate. Immaculately presented both inside and out, this home offers a free flowing layout that will certainly accommodate the entire family. Your own little patch of paradise is surrounded by walking tracks, grasslands and reserves creating a private and tranquil space that is perfect for entertaining family and friends for gatherings or barbecues in all seasons.
Offering 2 separate living spaces, the home is less than 4 years old. The master bedroom is spacious and offers a full ensuite complete with oversized shower, feature niche and a large WIR, whilst the remaining bedrooms have BIRs and are serviced by the main bathroom.
The central fully equipped kitchen is a masterpiece filled with natural light and boasts stone benches, glass splash back, pendant lighting, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Large windows capture the leafy outdoors, drawing you to admire the exquisite landscaped gardens, sunny aspect and birdlife. Triple stacker sliding doors connect you to the covered alfresco ensuring entertaining is a breeze.
Some of the many features include gas ducted heating, 2 split system cooling units, ceiling fans, mains gas connection to the alfresco, large deep fridge space with water connection facility, top quality window furnishings including privacy blinds, warm neutral tonings throughout, plush carpets, tiles to the traffic areas, security doors, internal access to the remote double garage, recycled water to the home, low maintenance yards, NBN availability and much more. This truly is comfortable and easy care living!
Situated in its very own quiet and secure pocket, this wonderful home is within close proximity to the new Gum Scrub Creek Primary School and Pre-school centre (due to open 2018), Officer Secondary College, the Cardinia Train Station, sporting ovals and recreation facilities, Club Officer, shops and the Monash freeway. The new Officer town centre is set to thrive in years to come with extras such as a proposed cinema and shopping complex with library, a proposed aquatic centre, just to name a few. Such an exciting opportunity exists to be living in a superb location with 'post code 3809' in your reach! Don't miss the Open home, properties like this simply won't last!

Description:
Impressive Home In Arcadia
Impressive modern façade and cleverly designed floor plan, this home has it all. Located in the sought-after Arcadia Estate in Officer, known for its fantastic location and accessibility to all amenities.
This stylish home comprises of an expansive modern open plan kitchen with breakfast bar, overhead cupboards, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and ample bench space overlooking the meals area and living zone.
The spacious master bedroom consists with walk in robe and private ensuite, additional three bedrooms with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Complimenting this gorgeous home, is an oversized undercover alfresco perfect for those summer nights which overlooks the backyard and landscaped gardens. Ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ceiling fan in living area and double remote garage with internal access.
When location is everything, look no further than 11 Turnbridge Road! Close to schools, shops, freeways, public transport and much more.
Call Nicola now to schedule an inspection or see us at our opens!

Description:
Emporium – Grand Living for You!
This home is straight from a cover of a magazine – styled to perfection with not a thing out of place inside and out! Never been lived in, the 3 year old home has been a display and includes plenty of added extras throughout the home. With an easy to live floor-plan the Burbank built home consists of 4 bedrooms – large master featuring deluxe ensuite and his and hers walk in robes, the remaining 3 are complete with built in mirrored robes, plus large open plan study with cavity sliders to create peace and quiet when needed. Built with the modern lifestyle in mind, the home is perfect for year round entertaining with alfresco under roofline and landscaped gardens. The kitchen overlooks the meals and family room and offers plenty of cupboard space, upgraded 900mm oven, walk in pantry, built in microwave oven and ceaser stone bench tops…ideal for the master chef! Other bonuses include gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, premium carpets, feature lighting throughout, high ceilings, double glazed windows and walk in linen closet…the list goes on! You have the option to move in after August/September 2017 or reap the rewards for the next few months at 8% leaseback. Located in the popular Timbertop Estate, this home is sure to impress – don't miss your opportunity to call this stylish place 'home'.
Sale By Set Date: Tuesday 25th July 2017 at 6.00pm (Unless sold prior)

Description:
Lightning Hill Estate - 20 Acre (8ha) Country Retreat
Nestled into an elevated position on Officers north side, this superbly tranquil yet accessible property may be just the ‘soul food’ you’ve been looking for.
Featuring a craftsman built Australian Homestead of some 48sq (imp) living, where quality and attention to detail are its hallmarks. A home that will accommodate families large or small in complete comfort with 5 bedrooms, study, exceptional living areas, 3 bathrooms and triple garage. Flanked by wide shaded verandahs and fully established gardens and lawns with mature specimen trees extending to areas of native vegetation. A wonderful paradise for the garden lovers!
A nearby 7.5 x 12m colorbond work shed plus purpose built, tilt slab constructed cellar door/winery with current liquor licence presents a wonderful opportunity to pursue a passion for wine making/brewing on an income producing level.
An existing vineyard (approx. 2 acres) will require some re planting and will benefit from further maintenance. Water to the vineyard is via two dams.
The property holds further potential for B & B accommodation, corporate functions/retreats (STCA). Its located just 1.3km approx. from the Princes Hwy and just minutes’ drive from popular Beaconsfield and Berwick, a range of excellent schools, Uni and a comfortable commute to Melbourne CBD via Monash Freeway.
Offered by its retiring vendors the property is for sale by negotiation. For particulars contact the selling agents.
FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THIS PROPERTY TEXT 130WHITESIDE TO 0428 442 622

Description:
Delightful home in Arena Parade
If you are a discerning buyer in the quest for the perfect location you will make sure to inspect this exclusive 22 squares Rawdon Hill Home built only 3 years ago on a 350m2 block situated right in the heart of Officers Arena Parade. Located only a short stroll from the Shopping Centre with all its shops, supermarket and cafes, minutes away from public transport or the Cardinia train station and with some of the best schools around, this quality home is no doubts ideal for the busy couple or smaller family. The house comprises 3 bedrooms of which a master bedroom with huge walk-in robe and ensuite with double shower plus 2 additional bedrooms in a separate area of the house both with double built-in robes and sharing the kids retreat or rumpus, the main bathroom and a separate toilet. In the passage and adjacent to the master bedroom is a convenient study nook with built-in desk. The floating floor boards from the front door to the main living area make it a breeze to maintain for the busy modern family. The MasterChef adept will enjoy the bright and well-appointed kitchen with a self-standing 900mm stainless gas cooktop and electric oven, a dishwasher and a convenient butler pantry with bench space for the all the extra appliances. The main living area includes the kitchen, dining and family room and opens onto the covered deck area at the back of the house. Additional features include high ceilings, downlights, quality fixtures, pendants and window coverings, floating floor boards, double garage with internal and backyard access plus space for 2 cars off the street in the driveway, a neatly landscaped yard and much more. This is the perfect home with nothing else to do but move-in and enjoy, make sure to bookmark our next open for inspection for a viewing and a chance to buy this unique home.

Description:
FRESH & ALLURING WITH CONTEMPORARY STYLE
An exciting opportunity in a highly-coveted locale, this beautiful 3 bed, 2 bath home combines character and superb space. The home is super modern and is your chance to break into the property scene, reap some solid investment rewards or downsize with consummate ease.
Privately nestled in a quiet part of Officer, its open concept and light-filled nature highlights a spacious living/meals area, contemporary well-appointed kitchen and formal lounge. Creature comforts include: gas ducted heating, 1.5kw solar system, alarm, split system cooling, 5.2 star energy rating, and single remote garage.
Conveniently located close to M1 freeway and Cardinia train station & transport. Don't delay homes are selling quickly and this gem won't last long.

Reach for the sky on Skyline Drive
Located in the highly sought after Grandvue Estate and surrounded by exquisite homes and parklands, this makes for a very easy decision! To buy the land and start building your dream home in this premium estate of Officer.
Boasting a generous frontage, this 1043m2 (approx.) block will allow you enough room to build.
With incredible views & within close proximity to Primary Schools, Private Colleges and the new Arena Shopping Centre this prime block of land will be sure to not disappoint.

Description:
A TRUE COTTAGE STYLE FAMILY HOME!
Come venture into a passage of time in the much sought after Arcadia Estate, nestled in the heart of Officer. This beautiful family home on Henrietta Avenue is located just off the Cardinia Road exit off the freeway.
On a generously sized block this 4 bedroom home is perfect for the growing family with plenty of space for the kids to play in. Included is a large secure garden with a play set, slide, swing, chalk board - and did I mention the slide?!
The master bedroom boasts a WIR and ensuite with the remaining three bedrooms with built in robes. The main living area embraces a open kitchen with more character than you can poke a stick at.
The garage is perfectly set up for a social area or man cave without interfering with car access.
The kitchen offers great amounts of storage and bench space for all the chefs out there. From the kitchen dining area we step outside onto the decking, perfect for parties and BBQs, a backyard garden with a fenced in veggie patch and storage shed including side access for all you weekend warriors! And don't forget real NBN for all your tech focused needs!
This home will find a loving family quickly so don't miss out!
Insights: 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
